etomica.space

Interface IOrientation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IOrientation2D, IOrientation3D, IOrientationFull3D
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Orientation2D, Orientation3D, OrientationFull3D

    public interface IOrientation
    Interface for a class that specifies an orientation in space.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void E(IOrientation o)
      Copies the given orientation to this one.
      IVector getDirection()
      Returns a unit vector pointing in the orientation's direction.
      void randomRotation(IRandom random, double theta)
      Perform a rotation by a random amount in the solid angle theta on the present orientation.
      void setDirection(IVector newDirection)
      Sets the orientation's direction to be the given direction.

    • Method Detail

      • E

        void E(IOrientation o)
        Copies the given orientation to this one.

      • getDirection

        IVector getDirection()
        Returns a unit vector pointing in the orientation's direction. This vector should not be modified.

      • setDirection

        void setDirection(IVector newDirection)
        Sets the orientation's direction to be the given direction.

      • randomRotation

        void randomRotation(IRandom random,
                    double theta)
        Perform a rotation by a random amount in the solid angle theta on the present orientation.
